tennis.title: Tennis
tennis.subtitle: Programs for Every Player
tennis.description: Our tennis programs span all ages and skill levels—from youth and juniors to adults. Whether you're picking up a racquet for the first time or competing in league play, we have the programs and pros to keep you in the game.
tennis.ratingSystem: We use the National Tennis Rating Program (NTRP) to ensure players are matched with appropriate skill-level groups for lessons and league play.

fitness.title: Fitness
fitness.subtitle: Train Your Way
fitness.description: Our fitness center is equipped to help you reach your goals, whether you're into cardio, strength training, or group classes. Beat the boredom with varied workouts and expert guidance from our certified trainers.

classes.intro: Regular strength and cardio programs ranging from 30 minutes to one hour. All classes are FREE for PVTFC members.

schedule.name: Cycle & Strength Intervals
schedule.description: Alternating 4-minute intervals of cycling and strength training. All fitness levels welcome.

schedule.name: Full Body Express
schedule.description: 30-minute full-body strength session plus optional 10-minute stretch.

schedule.name: Cardio/Strength
schedule.description: Total body workout using varied equipment. Modifications available for all fitness levels.

schedule.name: Cycle N'Core
schedule.description: 30 minutes of cycling intervals (hills & speed) followed by 15 minutes of core work.

schedule.name: Muscle Up
schedule.description: Full-body strength training for all experience levels and abilities.

personalTraining.description: Certified Personal Trainers are here to help you in your fitness journey, every step of the way—whether you're just starting out, returning after a break or injury, or looking for professional guidance and motivation.

pickleball.title: Pickleball
pickleball.subtitle: The Fastest-Growing Sport in America
pickleball.description: Pickleball has exploded in popularity, and Pleasant Valley is your home court. We offer both indoor and outdoor courts for casual play, competitive matches, and organized events.
pickleball.guestPolicy: Members may bring guests at guest rates. After 3 guest visits, a membership is required.
